analysis.key_quote: I oppose this rule as the objective of it seems to be to politicize the civil service in a way that makes them beholden to the mercurial whims of the Whitehouse occupant (whoever they may be), rather than maintaining the quality of federal service that the public expects.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about politicization and its negative impact on the quality of federal service, which aligns with the indicators for opposition.
